snippet.title: Silent North Extended Trailer
snippet.description:
Ready to fend your self from the Horde and Human foe?
This is the Extended Trailer, the cut trailer is within the VR Games Showcase!

Wishlist Silent North!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2440750/Silent_North/
Join our discord 
https://discord.com/invite/silentnorth
Want to know more about Combat Waffle Studios?
https://combatwaffle.info

Silent North thrusts you into the Swedish Alps, battling the elements, Infected, and other players. Fight solo or team up, scavenging gear and crafting essentials. Intense PVPVE action ensures constant danger. Adapt, be resilient, and survive in this unpredictable landscape.

#vr #silentnorth #gaming
